function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative impact of harsh restrictions on the economy and people's lives","Impact":"Reduced compliance with medications, delayed cancer diagnosis, and mental health problems","Mitigation":"Adopting other NPHIs such as mass mask-wearing, patient isolation, and contact tracing","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population","Owner":"Policymakers"},{"Description":"Problems with universal access to vaccines and their effectiveness","Impact":"Inadequate control of pandemic and future epidemic waves","Mitigation":"Developing more public health strategies and addressing the impact of NPHIs on other health problems","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population","Owner":"Policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of evaluation of NPHIs effectiveness in different countries","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of NPHIs on population health problems beyond COVID-19","Mitigation":"Further research using a wide range of covariates and evaluation of the effectiveness of NPHIs","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research community","Owner":"Researchers"}]}
